nodes.text: Rungs was a Tintinna and a patron at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina. It was fond of the nightshift bartender Ackmena.

The Tintinna puppet was a repurposed prop from the 1976 movie, The Food of the Gods, on which Rick Baker and Tom Burman worked. Although not initially identified by name in The Star Wars Holiday Special, the Star Wars Blog article, The Star Wars Holiday Special Cantina: Who's Who identified this Tintinna as "Rungs".
